amendment.description: Amendment requires a report from Director of National Intelligence on the threat posed by man-made electromagnetic pulse weapons to United States interests through 2025, including threats from foreign countries and foreign non-State actors.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 113-465 to require a report from DNI on the threat posed by man-made electromagnetic pulse weapons to United States interests through 2025, including threats from foreign countries and foreign non-State actors.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Franks (AZ) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Franks (AZ).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Franks (AZ) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
